IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.has_not_read_mail') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.has_not_read_mail GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.has_not_read_mail @character_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON DECLARE @not_read_count INT SET @not_read_count = 0 SELECT @not_read_count = COUNT(id) FROM dbo.mails WHERE character_id = @character_id AND is_read = 0
SET NOCOUNT OFF IF @not_read_count > 0 BEGIN return 1 END ELSE BEGIN return 0 END
